languages.text: "Значит, так. С этого момента любые работы с вакуумным шлюзом проводятся только в присутствии досточтимых техножрецов".

traits.locale_text:
[Draft I am Gunnery Sergeant Hartman, your Senior Drill Instructor. From now on, you will speak only when spoken to, and the first and last words out of your filthy sewers will be "Sir!"
Do you maggots understand that?

languages.text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."
languages.original_text: "Значит, так. С этого момента любые работы с вакуумным шлюзом проводятся только в присутствии досточтимых техножрецов".

traits.locale_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."
"So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."
"So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

languages.text: "Von nun an wird jede Aktion an den Vakuumschlössern nur noch im Beisein unserer geschätzten Techpriester durchgeführt."
languages.original_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: "Von nun an wird jede Aktion an den Vakuumschlössern nur noch im Beisein unserer geschätzten Techpriester durchgeführt."

languages.text: « Donc à partir de maintenant, si vous devez toucher au système de verrouillage des sas, ce sera uniquement en présence de nos vénérables technoprêtres. »
languages.original_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: « Donc à partir de maintenant, si vous devez toucher au système de verrouillage des sas, ce sera uniquement en présence de nos vénérables technoprêtres. »

languages.text: “因此从现在开始，只有当尊敬的技术神甫在场的情况下，才允许操作气闸的闭锁装置。”
languages.original_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: “因此从现在开始，只有当尊敬的技术祭司在场的情况下，才允许操作气闸的闭锁装置。”

languages.text: 「では、これからは、真空ロックの修理は我らが高名なる技術司祭の監督の下で行うこととする」
languages.original_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: 「では、これからは、真空ロックの修理は我らが高名なる技術司祭の監督の下で行うこととする」
「では、これからは、真空ロックの修理は我らが高名なる技術司祭の監督の下で行うこととする」

languages.text: «Así que, a partir de ahora, si es necesario manipular las cerraduras del vacío, solo se hará en la presencia de nuestros estimados tecnosacerdotes».
languages.original_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: «Así que, a partir de ahora, si se han de manipular las cerraduras del vacío, solo se hará en la presencia de nuestros estimados tecnosacerdotes».

languages.text: "Bundan böyle vakum kilidiyle ilgili her türlü müdahale, yalnızca ve yalnızca muhterem Tekno Rahiplerimizin huzurunda yapılacak."
languages.original_text: "So, from now on, any tinkering with the vacuum locks is to be carried out only in the presence of our esteemed Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: "Bundan böyle vakum kilidiyle ilgili her türlü müdahale, yalnızca ve yalnızca muhterem Tekno Rahiplerimizin huzurunda yapılacak."
